Title: Version in the app does not match version in the App Store
Steps: "1. Launch app 2. Pay attention to the app version 3. Open the App page in the App Store 4. Pay attention to the app version."
AR: "Version in the App V2.1.2 Version in the App Store V1.0.2"
ER: Version in the app matches the version in the App Store
Author: @yKovalevy
